author: Kurt Zindulka, Kurt Zindulka
title: British Health Service to Use Plasma Transfusions to Treat Coronavirus
description: The National Health Service (NHS) in the United Kingdom will begin treating coronavirus patients with plasma transfusions from those who have recently recovered from the Chinese virus.
content:
The National Health Service (NHS) in the United Kingdom will begin treating coronavirus patients with plasma transfusions from those who have recently recovered from the Chinese virus.
Britain’s medicines watchdog has approved the use of blood recovered from… [+3082 chars]
